reviews.text: Family had dinner at restaurant , 3 meals prepared well, the fourth left a steak very under cooked
reviews.title: Great location in Fussen!

reviews.text: Service by one waitress down right rude. However, the breakfast service was excellent- what a
reviews.title: No corporate blandness here!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for the 2nd time and was very happy with the choice both times. Nice rooms (some may say too modern décor, but really comfortable anyway), great location in the very center with parking on site, *very* good buffet breakfast (far away from all other "continental" options) + sauna on the top floor. perfect location for exploring the town center.
reviews.title: great stay in the very town center with a few nice bonuses included

reviews.text: The place has a bavarian hospitality touch, everyone knows you and greets by your name. Rooms are new with excellent decor - large and sunny. We had breakfast and dinner at the restaurant which serves excellent authentic food.
reviews.title: Large spacious rooms at the center of old town!
Efficient service,comfortable room
reviews.text: Get the parking in the downstairs parking lot - it's only two euros more with your dedicated parking spot and a lift. Try to order castle tickets from the hotel previous evening - as the lines at the location can get unwieldy.

reviews.title: Great stay, decor not to everyone's taste
reviews.text: Great overall experience, we would definitely come back!
Met the expectations we had going on previous reviews on trip advisor.Helpful and efficient staff and well appointed rooms.
reviews.title: A Great Place to Stay

reviews.text: Loved our stay. We stayed in a triple room and was very comfortable.The breakfast is amazing!!! Wonderful selection. We only stayed one night but wished we stayed longer! The location is so convenient too!
reviews.title: Excellent decision to stay here!

reviews.text: very unusual boutique hotel had to be the best in fussen.its like stepping back in time. we had wonderful views of the alps from our balcony. gettin there from munich was an experience on the train which clanked and banged the whole way there. people are v helpful and speak great english.
reviews.title: fantastic hotel in a wonderful location
Wait for it....
reviews.text: Candidly, my first impression was "Hmmmm?.." then it hit me, the decor is "Ludwig", and everything fell into place. Hotel Sonne is a very unique one of a kind hotel, almost kitschi with an ultra modern touch. Old style castle meets technoland (doors & bathroom) blend for a satisfying stay. Great staff and clean well appointed room, robes, slippers etc and luxurious feather bedding. The underground garage is indeed a trip, and worth the 2 extra euros to park...but beware, drivings skils are needed, very tight stalls. The stand out, as per previous posters, was the breakfast...very very fresh! Three types of eggs, two types of sausages, bacon, quiche, fresh cheeses six styles, fresh fruit, delicious yoghurt, pastries (wow) and one of my favourites, a machine that produces orange juice from , you guessed it, fresh oranges! Staff are very attentive as well...all in all a delightful stay. One other thing, when booking please realize that the "castle view" room is not THE castle view but is the the Hohen Schloss in Fussen!

We chose this hotel because of it's top ranking on Tripadvisor and we were not disappointed. We loved everything about this hotel and their restaurant has a superb and extensive breakfast. You cannot ask for a better location, great restaurant, great bar and a warm friendly staff. I accidentally left my expensive camera locked in my room safe and did not realize it until the following day. I contacted Sebastian at the front desk and explained that I had let my camera in the room. My camera was found and they shipped it back to me free of charge. I asked them if they wanted my credit card to pay for shipping and Sebastian replied that they would ship it to me free of charge.....now that is customer service.
reviews.title: Superb rooms, great location and a friendly helpful staff A++++

reviews.text: Based on our experience in the 3 days we spent at the Hotel Sonne, we highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay

reviews.text: Nice place. Very good restaurant. Staffs are very friendly. Two double beds are good for family of 4, at least in Europe standard. Underground parking is a little bit small. Maybe a little bit over decorated but I like it.
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.text: Best place we stayed on our vacation. Stayed two nights and staff was always positive and helpful. Booked our tickets to the castles at time we requested. Room was great with comfortable mattress. Bathroom had a walk in shower and separate tub. Great location in heart of town with a wonderful atmosphere at the bar to grab light food. Fussen is a charming town that is definitely worth a visit. The breakfast was to die for!!!
reviews.title: Fantastic place in Basvarian Alps

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in hotel Sonne for 3 days half board. The room has a very romantic sphere. Clean and spacious. Very friendly staff by the reception and restaurant. Breakfast was great, with variety of choices. Dinner was also good. We could choose from 2 dishes for every course in a 3 course meal. The price is reasonable. Parking is available. The hotel is located in the centre of Fuessen.which is very close to the 2 castles. I will definitely recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Great hotel, very friendly staff
Wonderful stay,
reviews.text: My family traveled here in April where we only stayed 1 night, but found it to be one of our best hotels. The room was lovely with wonderful black out shades! The breakfast buffet which was included was wonderful and the service staff were extremely friendly and very helpful! This hotel definitely deserves the great ratings people give it as it lives up to them.

Hotel Sonne is a family run inn and this is reflected in many ways. The location, room, breakfast, and service were everything we expected of such a highly rated hotel. Every member of their staff went out of their way to be helpful. Their number one rating is well deserved.
reviews.title: Wonderful service
